code: import React from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Leaderboard=_ref=>{let{users}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"leaderboard-section",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Leaderboard"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"leaderboard",children:users.sort((a,b)=>b.totalPoints-a.totalPoints).map((user,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"leaderboard-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"rank",children:["#",index+1]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"username",children:user.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"totalPoints",children:[user.totalPoints," pts"]})]},user._id))})]});};export default Leaderboard;
